content.rendered:
TTE recently migrated its health and safety management systems from OHSAS 18001:2017 to ISO 45001:2018 by Bureau Veritas.

The transition audit was conducted along with the surveillance audit for IMS according to ISO 9001 and ISO 14001 standards. Though online audits were the new normal over the past few months, TTE underwent a regular on site audit, which concluded with several positive observations and few opportunities of improvement.

Structured procurement process, appropriate control mechanisms within the project execution and Facility Management services facilitated a smooth audit. With this accolade, TTE joins the list of other entities in the Easa Saleh Al Gurg Group to have successfully migrated to ISO 45001:2018 standards
